prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Shackelford Family Papers, Accession #3525-al, Special Collections Dept., University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This accession was given to the Library on October 31, 1980 by George Green Shackelford of Blacksburg, Virginia.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This collection consists chiefly of correspondence between George Green Shackelford and his mother, Peachy Gascoigne (Lyne) Shackelford of "Willow Grove," Orange County, Virginia, containing family news. Also included is material regarding George Green Shackelford's naval reserve service; obituaries of Virginius Randolph Shackelford, father of George Green Shackelford; memorabilia; and photographs.
